member.name: ID3D12RootSignatureDeserializer.GetRootSignatureDesc
member.summary: Gets the layout of the root signature.
member.returns: This method returns a deserialized root signature in a structure that describes the layout of the root signature.

member.name: ID3D12RootSignatureDeserializer
member.summary: Contains a method to return the deserializeddata structure, of a serialized root signature version 1.0.
